DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate natural course result operative treatment chronic tennis elbow ( TE ) . Chronic define symptom last year . The investigator also study effect pain catastrophising subjective outcome , patient acceptable symptomatic state response shift phenomenon TE . The study also ascertain feasibility multi-center randomise , control trial ( RCT ) , test refine co-operation interaction plan RCT center .
DOC.brief_title: Finnish Tennis Elbow Trial Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : 1 . To study natural course tennis elbow/spontaneous recovery chronic ( last 12 month ) tennis elbow result surgery pragmatic setting . 2 . To investigate patient ' expectation treatment , define patient acceptable symptomatic state , PASS , tennis elbow . 3 . To investigate effect pain behaviour treatment result PASS . 4 . To delineate existence potential `` response shift '' -phenomenon patient tennis elbow . 5 . To determine feasibility prospective , placebo-controlled , randomised trial find actual number patient center may suitable FINITE-RCT . The investigator also test function response plan outcome measure environment purpose . Study set The study carry prospective open-label multi-center cohort study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinically diagnosed tennis elbow define : Pain lateral side elbow , make bad pressure apply lateral epicondyle humerus resist extension wrist make fist elbow joint straight . 2 . Duration symptom 10 month 3 . Age 35 60 year 4 . Ability fill Finnish questionnaires 5 . Written inform consent 1 . Earlier fracture dislocation elbow joint area 2 . Earlier surgical treatment elbow joint 3 . Congenital deformity elbow 4 . Systemic muscle , tendon , nerve joint disease 5 . Other problem cause pain elbow joint : 1 . Pain medial epicondyle elbow 2 . Pain biceps muscle tendon 3 . Painful snap crepitus elbow joint 4 . Instability elbow joint ( table top , posterolateral drawer test ) 6 . A passive movement limitation 10 degree elbow joint 7 . Abnormal find elbow joint Xray . An elbow joint Xray routine examination elbow symptom .
